com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.recovery.constrain

Class UnconstrainedLaunchConstrainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.recovery.constrain.UnconstrainedLaunchConstrainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LaunchConstrainer

    public class UnconstrainedLaunchConstrainer
extends java.lang.Object
implements LaunchConstrainer
    Implementation of LaunchConstrainer that always allows launches.

    This is equivalent to disabling the launch constraining feature.

    • Method Detail

      • launchHappened

        public void launchHappened(Operation launchOperation,
                           RecoveryRequirement.RecoveryType recoveryType)
        Description copied from interface: LaunchConstrainer
        Invoked every time a task is launchHappened.

        We take a Operation so that frameworks can specify additional metadata, in order to smooth the launch rate.

        Specified by:
        launchHappened in interface LaunchConstrainer
        Parameters:
        launchOperation - The Launch Operation which occurred.
        recoveryType - The type of the recovery which has been executed.

      • canLaunch

        public boolean canLaunch(RecoveryRequirement recoveryRequirement)
        Description copied from interface: LaunchConstrainer
        Determines whether the given RecoveryRequirement can be launchHappened right now.
        Specified by:
        canLaunch in interface LaunchConstrainer
        Parameters:
        recoveryRequirement - The RecoveryRequirement to be examined.
        Returns:
        True if the offer is safe to launch immediately, false if it should wait
